title: Ayurvedic Body Scrub (Coffee + Turmeric)
excerpt: A natural exfoliating scrub made with coffee grounds, turmeric, and coconut oil to brighten and invigorate the skin.
content:
## What Is This Body Scrub?
A revitalizing Ayurvedic body scrub that blends exfoliating coffee grounds with turmeric and coconut oil to brighten and smooth the skin.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Coffee stimulates circulation and warms Kapha tissues. Turmeric supports natural glow and reduces minor inflammation.

### Key Benefits
- Exfoliates dead skin cells.
- Improves circulation.
- Leaves skin soft, bright, and refreshed.

## Ingredients
- Coffee grounds
- Turmeric powder
- Coconut oil

## Usage Instructions
- Apply to damp skin in the shower. Massage gently in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly. Use 1–2 times weekly.

## Packaging
- Sturdy jar with scooper for hygienic use.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid on open cuts, active acne, or very sensitive skin. Turmeric may stain light fabrics.

## Why Choose This Scrub?
A natural, energizing exfoliator made with simple Ayurvedic botanicals and oils.
